    • getLessonReviews

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'READ\')") @GetMapping("/lessons/{id}") public List<ReviewDto> getLessonReviews​(@PathVariable Long id)
      Parameters:
      id - id of the lesson for which reviews should be returned
      Returns:
      reviews written about given lesson

    • getCourseLessonsReviews

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'READ\')") @GetMapping("/courses/{id}/lessons") public List<ReviewDto> getCourseLessonsReviews​(@PathVariable Long id)
      Parameters:
      id - id of the course for which lesson reviews should be returned
      Returns:
      list of reviews written about lessons which belong to given course

    • getCourseReviews

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'READ\')") @GetMapping("/courses/{id}") public List<ReviewDto> getCourseReviews​(@PathVariable Long id)
      Parameters:
      id - id of the course for which reviews should be returned
      Returns:
      reviews written about given course

    • createReview

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'WRITE_REVIEW\')") @PutMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> createReview​(@RequestBody ReviewDto reviewDto)
      Parameters:
      reviewDto - review data: rating, review text, lesson or course id (review can be written about only one item)
      Returns:
      feedback success message

    • editReview

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'WRITE_REVIEW\')") @PostMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> editReview​(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody ReviewDto reviewDto)
      Parameters:
      id - id of the edited review
      reviewDto - reviewDto data that should be edited
      Returns:
      edited review data

    • deleteReview

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'DELETE_REVIEW\')") @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> deleteReview​(@PathVariable Long id)
      Parameters:
      id - id of the review that should be deleted
      Returns:
      successful deletion message
